CreateLove.title: Create Custom Page
CreateLove.description: Complete the steps below to create your special memories page.

background_effects.title: Background Effects
background_effects.description: Select a background effect for your page.

form.step1_description: Choose a name for your page. This will be used in the URL.
form.step2_description: Add a title that will appear at the top of your page.
form.step3_description: Select a date that symbolizes the beginning of something special.
form.step4_description: Write a personal message or tell your story.
form.step5_description: Select up to 10 photos to customize your page.
form.step6_description: Add a Spotify song to play on your page.
form.step7_description: Select a background effect for your page.
form.page_name_helper: Use only letters, numbers, and hyphens. No spaces.
form.page_title_placeholder: Ex: Loving you for: or Our memories
form.page_title_helper: This title will appear at the top of your page.
form.date_counter_helper: The page will show how many days have passed since this date.
form.message_helper: Be creative, tell your story or show your love.
form.spotify_helper: Paste a link to a Spotify song, album, or playlist.
form.spotify_error: Please enter a valid Spotify link or leave it blank.

preview.sample_message: Here's a special message for you... ❤️
